titles.title: Flexibility to Increase IDEA Funding Act
To provide funding flexibility to States and local educational agencies with respect to programs to provide special education and related services to children with disabilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 4/4/2001--Introduced. Flexibility to Increase IDEA Funding Act - Authorizes States and local educational agencies to transfer amounts from specified programs under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 and the Carl D. Perkins Vocational and Technical Education Act of 1998 to programs to provide special education and related services to children with disabilities under the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA).
